query:
ALTER TABLE subscriptions 
  MODIFY COLUMN plan ENUM('free', 'pro', 'enterprise') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free',
  MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('active', 'canceled', 'incomplete', 'incomplete_expired', 'past_due', 'trialing', 'unpaid', 'paused') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  MODIFY COLUMN stripeCustomerId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '';
